message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $14000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of the product, I'm only able to offer $12000 at this time. Let me know if that works for you.

Bob, I understand your position.  While $12000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to come down to $13500. This would still allow me to make a reasonable profit, and it's a great price for such a valuable product.  Let's find a way to make this work for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still firm on my offer of $12000. This is my final offer, as it's my maximum budget. I'm hopeful we can reach an agreement.
